physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a lady. She has her hair tied back and she is wearing her ethnic costume. It is long sleeved and there is a collar, with the piping running down the right hand side of her outfit.
sgcool_label_text:
This photograph shows a woman wearing a floral Chinese robe.

Studios were already established across the Strait Settlements and the Dutch East Indies by the 1840s and became increasingly prevalent in the 1850s. During the 1920s, Chinese-owned studios dominated the studio photography trade in Southeast Asia.
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Women Ethnic costume
